```{r echo=False}
library(readr)

library(data.table)

```

```{r show_col_types = FALSE}
urls = c('https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.episode.tsv.gz', 'https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.ratings.tsv.gz', 'https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.episode.tsv.gz')

datasets <- lapply(urls, read_delim, delim='\t', na = '\\N')
episode <- datasets[[1]]
ratings <- datasets[[2]]
titles <- datasets[[3]]
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
str(episode)
summary(episode)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# The 'title.ratings' dataset
str(ratings)
summary(ratings)
knitr::kable(head(ratings), caption = "First few rows of 'title.ratings' dataset", escape = TRUE)

```
